page.title: 13Gardens,Brenchley & Matfield
page.content: Local gardeners take great pride in their{attractive gardens}They are very knowledgeable and enjoy spending time caring for their plants and crops. Most gardens have ornamental trees, flowering shrubs and fruit trees which are underplanted with bulbs.There are flower borders and,close to the house, tubs and hanging baskets,with petunias and fuchsias well to the fore.Conifers and Rhododendrons do well here.There is frequently a pond with fish. Usually a{vegetable and fruit plot is cultivated to keep house and freezer supplied.A{greenhouse}is used for tomatoes and to grow seedlings ready for tubs and borders. A number of gardens now have an unmown grass section devoted to bluebells,cowslips and other{wild {flowers}which encourage{butterflies. {Herb gardens}are becoming popular.
